--- select_singer_with_in_and_unnest_with_query_parameter.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  Singers
WHERE
  SingerId IN UNNEST(@singerIDs)

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Results: []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Star{
        Star: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &ast.From{
      From: 11,
      Source: &ast.TableName{
        Table: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 18,
          NameEnd: 25,
          Name: "Singers",
        },
      },
    },
    Where: &ast.Where{
      Where: 26,
      Expr: &ast.InExpr{
        Left: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 34,
          NameEnd: 42,
          Name: "SingerId",
        },
        Right: &ast.UnnestInCondition{
          Unnest: 46,
          Rparen: 63,
          Expr: &ast.Param{
            Atmark: 53,
            Name: "singerIDs",
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM Singers WHERE SingerId IN UNNEST(@singerIDs)
